required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Local Retrospective Observational Study to Evaluate the Treatment Patterns of mCRPC Patients in Belgium Treated With Radium-223
clinical_study.official_title: A Local Retrospective Observational Study to Evaluate the Treatment Patterns of mCRPC Patients in Belgium Treated With Radium-223

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this non interventional study is to describe the proportion of Belgian mCRPC patients which were treated with 1 to 4 and 5 to 6 Radium-223 injections and the patient characteristics which are potentially associated with this proportion.

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of patients with 5-6 Radium-223 injections versus 1-4 Radium-223 injections
primary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of patients with 5-6 Radium-223 injections versus 1-4 Radium-223 injections by Radium-223 line of treatment (1st, 2nd and further line)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of prior and post life prolonging systemic anti-cancer therapies will be described
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The characteristics of patients according to the experience of the study centers with Radium-223
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018
secondary_outcome.description: By stratification according to the number of months after the very first index date per center

secondary_outcome.measure: The occurrence of progression post first dose of Radium-223
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The occurrence of SSE related hospitalizations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The frequency of SSE related hospitalizations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of discontinuation of Radium-223
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018
Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The overall survival in routine clinical practice
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of patients receiving first- and second-line systemic anti-cancer treatment in mCRPC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The timing of progression post first dose of Radium-223
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The time between last Radium-223 injection and next line of systemic anti-cancer therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of patients receiving next line of systemic anti-cancer therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospectively analysis from 22 December 2013 to 01 June 2018

arm_group.description: Belgium patients with a diagnosis of mCRPC (no known visceral metastases) and who were treated with Radium-223 for this indication

intervention.description: Follow the physician's prescription in routine clinical practice.

study_pop.textblock: Belgian patients who were treated with Radium-223 for (metastatic) Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with a diagnosis of castration-resistant prostate cancer, symptomatic bone metastases and no known visceral metastases
- All consecutive patients who started Radium-223 treatment between 22 December 2014 and 01 June 2017
- Availability of medical records during the observation period (22DEC2013 - 01JUN2018)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients treated with Radium-223 for any reason before 22 December 2014 (for example an interventional trial)
- Patients participated in an investigational program with interventions outside of routine clinical practice during the radium-223 treatment period
- Patients received other radiopharmaceuticals for the systemic concomitant use for treatment of prostate cancer or for other use during the Radium-223 treatment period
